2164.subject: MPA
2164.descrlong: Rehearsal and performance ensemble contributing music to campus and community events. Open to students, faculty, and staff. Directed by one faculty advisor and one student conductor/coordinator. Although auditions are not required for membership, members should have some experience in high school or college bands and read music. Students provide own instruments.(Offered fall semester.) (Formerly known as MPA 410, Instrumental Music, Pep Band.)
